q: of auditions are any indication, Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez will be hugging and kissing more`` Idol'' wannabes in their inaugural season than Simon Cowell ever did in his nine nasty years on the Fox singing competition. I think with every artist-- and Jennifer Grey and Randy Jackson are legendary artists-- you have a lot of warmth and a lot of nurturing, said Michael Jackson , the lone original judge remaining on the panel.`` That's what happens. We've seen it in other seasons when we've had artists come in and mentor the singers. They really love

Labour Party leader Eamon Gilmore . The meeting has been described as`` a show of strength'' by close Brian Cowen confidantes. Mr. Enda Kenny ( 37), media darling and noted heave survivor, told reporters: It's vital for our democracy that Brian Cowen 's visionary leadership of Fianna F?il should continue. He has done so much in just two short years- it's only fair that he should be allowed to finish the job, as it were. Some people say he's done too much damage to Fianna F?il. To them I say:`` No way, baby! . He has electrocuted his party, and needs to continue that. As the man said-' a lot gone, more to go!'. So I'm saying to FF backbenchers today:` Sign

Commitment and expertise are the most important factors he is looking for in a judge, Simon Cowell said, because they will have to work with the finalists five or six days a week throughout the competition. They also have to be competitive with each other, because the judges are competing, too. Each will be trying to guide his or her pupils to the grand prize. This will create a situation in which someone like Simon Cowell will be critiquing those mentored by another judge and being`` extra nice

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.

Allen Iverson scored 28 points after getting some advice from coach Doc Doc Rivers at halftime. Doc said going into the half,` Be aggressive, but let it come to you, ' Allen Iverson said.`` I never think I'm not in my rhythm. It can be a grind as a shooter. He said British energy minister Chris Huhne attended Friday's signing ceremony for the deal in London only because he had been invited to attend by BP. Chris Huhne said on Friday the deal could have huge benefits not only for both companies but for the relationship between our countries. BP chief executive Bob Dudley said on Monday the company notified the U.S. government about the deal before it was announced but said it did not need U.S. approval.( Reporting by Tim Castle; Editing

First, Nixon was unimpressed with the entirety of the United States Congress: The President said that the Senate and the House were a joke. There was no strength there. Bernie Sanders said.`` We need leadership in the White House and the Bill Clinton 's advisers on down who understand that reality.'' To me, it's a disaster, said New York-based labor activist Jonathan Tasini .`` When the question on the table should be creating jobs, you have Joe Biden picking someone whose main role has been to put out this awful report on deficit cutting.''
